name: VAR_ALLELE_NAME
description: The VAR_ALLELE_NAME table contains information about the alleles the variant belongs to.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALLELE_NAME
columns.description: The allele names to which the variants belong.
